name: Cello's Last Concert
description:
Our little Cello has had enough !
Between shows, producers and an ungrateful crowd...
She is now out to crack some horns! 
Help Cello realise she plays much better when she's mad and OUT OF CONTROL!

Try helping Cello by controlling her to the beat!

The games mechanics, enemy behaviour,  background visuals and more are based on a completely procedural system that  analyses the background music to create rhythm based gameplay that is both challenging and satisfying!

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game jam
By:   
Emil Lager (Development) - emilatron@gmail.com

Amir Buganov ( 3D artist, rigger and animator) - amirbuganov@gmail.com

Nataly Lepler (Concept  and 3D artist, Texturing and UI) - kirarin16@gmail.com

Made with Unity, Blender and Photoshop 
All songs are Copyright free!  We do not own any of the music in this game
